page.title: 04Shopping
page.content: In the main families shop in Consett at one of the{supermarkets.}Some families do travel out of town to do their shopping at{hyper-markets}.There is very little opportunity to do much shopping in Delves or Grove areas(but Blackhill does have more shops) so these people must{travel to shop. In recent years a new bus stand and {covered market}have been opened in Consett and a{shopping precinct.}The main shopping area is gradually becoming traffic free. The local traders do not like this market. The number of shops have been reduced in recent years since the closure of the steelworks in 1980. Others have moved location. The Co-op which had an expansive site which it had occupied for many years has now moved into the pedestrian way.
